General.Name: Highmark Interactive Inc
General.Description: Highmark Interactive Inc., together with its subsidiaries, designs and develops mobile and virtual neurological performance testing and concussion management tools in Canada and internationally. The company collects normative neurologic functional data that enhances physicians' ability to diagnose, treat, and augment. Its software as a medical device platform includes EQ brian performance that measures aspects of neurological function and mental wellness; and BrainFx offers digital cognitive assessments to help health professionals understand a person's neurofunction, illuminate mild to moderate dysfunction, and deliver unique insights; and Complex Injury Rehab, a multi-disciplinary specialized rehabilitation platform. The company is headquartered in Oakville, Canada.
General.Address: 602-115 George Street, Oakville, ON, Canada, L6J 0A2
